mapper.select: select DISTINCT mt.theater_no, ms.schedule_date from MGV_THEATERS mt, MGV_THEATER_SCREEN mts , MGV_SCHEDULE ms WHERE mt.THEATER_NO = #{theaterNo} and mt.THEATER_NO = mts.THEATER_NO and mts.SCREEN_ID = ms.SCREEN_ID

select A.schedule_id as id, A.schedule_turn as turn, A.schedule_start_time as start, A.schedule_end_time as end, B.movie_title as title from MGV_SCHEDULE A, MGV_MOVIE B where screen_id = #{screenId} and SCHEDULE_DATE = #{date} and A.movie_no = B.movie_no
mapper.insert: insert into MGV_SCHEDULE (schedule_date, schedule_turn, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time, screen_info, remaining_seats, screen_seats, movie_no, screen_id) values (#{date},#{turn},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{screenInfo},#{seats},#{seats},#{movieNo},#{screenId})
